testLanding.title: Test Registration
testLanding.alreadyCompleted: You have already completed this test
testLanding.intro: This test will help determine your professional competencies and motivational factors. The results will be presented as a detailed personal report with development recommendations.
testLanding.progressInfo: Your progress is automatically saved every 30 seconds. If you accidentally close the browser or interrupt the test, you can continue from the same place by returning to this link.
testLanding.emailHelper: The report will be sent to this email
testLanding.privacyAgreement: I have read and agree with the privacy policy and personal data processing *
testLanding.privacyAgreementNote: By clicking "Start Test", you consent to the processing of personal data in accordance with GDPR.
testLanding.faq1q: What if the test is interrupted?
testLanding.faq1a: Don't worry! Your progress is automatically saved. Just return to the same link and enter the same email - you will continue from where you left off.
testLanding.faq2a: Each email can take the test only once. If you need to retake the test, contact the coach who provided the link.
testLanding.faq3q: How will I get the results?
testLanding.faq3a: After completing the test, you will immediately see the results on the screen and can download the PDF report or send it to your email.
testQuestions.title: Test Questions
testResults.title: Test Results
testResults.thankYou: Thank you for participating. Your personal report is ready.
testLanding.privacyPolicyLink: Privacy Policy and Personal Data Processing
testLanding.privacyPolicyTitle: Privacy Policy and Personal Data Processing
testLanding.gdprText:
PRIVACY POLICY AND PERSONAL DATA PROCESSING

1. GENERAL PROVISIONS
This Privacy Policy defines the procedure for processing and protecting the personal data of users of the professional competencies and motivational factors testing platform.

2. PURPOSES OF DATA PROCESSING
We process your personal data exclusively for the following purposes:
- Conducting psychological and professional testing
- Generating personal reports and recommendations
- Sending test results to the specified email
- Ensuring the ability to continue the test after a break

3. TYPES OF DATA PROCESSED
During testing, we collect and process the following data:
- First and last name
- Email address
- Professional activity/specialization
- Answers to test questions
- Test completion timestamps
- Session technical data (for progress recovery)

4. DATA SUBJECT RIGHTS
In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
- Right to access your personal data
- Right to correct inaccurate or incomplete data
- Right to delete personal data ("right to be forgotten")
- Right to restrict processing of personal data
- Right to object to data processing
- Right to data portability

5. LEGAL BASIS FOR PROCESSING
Your personal data is processed based on:
- Your voluntary consent to data processing
- The necessity to fulfill contractual obligations
- Legitimate interests for competency assessment

6. DATA SECURITY
We apply modern technical and organizational measures to protect your data:
- Encryption of transmitted data (HTTPS)
- Restricted access to data (authorized personnel only)
- Regular backups
- System security monitoring
- Staff training on data protection

7. DATA TRANSFER TO THIRD PARTIES
Your personal data is not transferred to third parties, except in the following cases:
- When necessary to provide the service (e.g., sending the report)
- Legal requirements
- With your explicit consent

8. INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFER
When transferring data internationally, we ensure an adequate level of protection in accordance with GDPR requirements.

9. DATA RETENTION PERIOD
Personal data is stored no longer than necessary for processing purposes:
- Test results: 30 days after completion
- Session technical data: deleted after test completion
- Contact data: deleted 30 days after report is sent

10. COOKIES AND ANALYTICS
We use only the minimum necessary technical cookies to ensure the site functions and to save test progress.

11. CONTACT INFORMATION
For questions about personal data processing, contact:
Email: privacy@testplatform.com
Request processing time: up to 30 days

12. POLICY CHANGES
We may update this Privacy Policy. You will be notified of any changes in advance.

Last updated: [current date]

By continuing to use the service, you confirm that you have read this Privacy Policy and agree to the terms of personal data processing.
